name: Сorporate Trainer (3D scanners and software)
description:
We develop the leading 3D handheld scanners, innovative 3D data processing technology and facial recognition systems.

Our clients make the world's best automobiles, computers, clothing, computer graphics, consumer electronics, computer games and security systems.

Our company is made up of bright, forward thinking and motivated people with a sense of fun and adventure.

Our offices are great, exciting spaces to work in, located in Luxembourg, California, Moscow, and Shanghai.

We are looking for a corporate trainer to join our team in Moscow or Luxembourg.

Working alongside seasoned professionals, you will provide informative and inspiring training on Artec 3D scanners and software to our partners and customers worldwide.

Check out this video to see how our team does it:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wx-KHrwLTJo&t=1449s

Job scope:

  • Preparing training material from A to Z for new and existing partners, as well as for Artec staff
  • Creating/updating/improving the content of training sessions
  • Participating in the preparation and streaming of webinars and demos for our partners; drafting pertinent documentation
  • Improving your own 3D scanning skills on a permanent basis
  • Assisting the sales team during tradeshows and with routine scanner servicing tasks (checks, repairs, etc.)
  • Collaborating with the marketing team to create content for the corporate website

Requirements:

  • Fluency in English and Spanish; any other language (French, German, Italian etc.) will be a big plus
  • Experience preparing material for training and delivering it
  • Strong communication skills, desire to help customers, answer tricky questions
  • Team player and self-starter
  • Willingness and possibility to travel around the globe

Preferred:

  • Background in engineering/science
  • Strong grasp of software for 3D modeling and/or CAD/QA/RE (SOLIDWORKS, 3D Systems, Autodesk, Rhino, ZBrush, Blender, etc.)
  • Presentation skills

Culture and benefits:

  • Comfortable office in Moscow or Luxembourg
  • A fun, relaxed environment to work, develop your own ideas, and fulfill your ambitions
  • Official employment and salary
  • Corporate medical insurance
  • Flexible working hours
  • Shared collection of board games
  • Snacks and hot lunches in the office
